I just realized I made a typo in my last post with Zardus. I meant to 
say while he was talking to Diamond, not while he was talking to 
Feline.

::Zardus/FZ::

Zardus nods, tapping a few keys on his wrist comp and activating the 
hologram projector again.

"The Predacons recently got a new base," he says, zooming in on the 
area, "But they are using jammers to disable scanning in the area. 
Sources tell me that the Predacons have turned hostile against the 
Alliance. Do you think you can get in without leaving much of a trail 
and assassinate their leader, without them knowing who did it?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ looks over at Feline as she wakes up, nodding in aproval at Squizzy 
before walking toward the newly ressurected femm.

"You're in the Iron Fist, the new Alliance base. You died in the 
battle against the Mafia, but Squizzy here managed to bring you back 
to life."

He looks over at Squizzy. "Is she complete, or is there more that 
needs to be done?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> "I shall accomplish my mission. What is it that you require me to 
do? 
> and where do you wish me to go?"
> 
> Feline2::
> She woke up and sat up on the table. She looked around and saw 
Zardus 
> and Squizzy. "What happened? where am I? What is going on?"
> She turned to Zardus. "Commander. Wh
